name: Lone Wolf Quest
description:
Lone Wolf Quest

You play as a submarine. On every level you have 3 minutes to destroy as many enemy ships / submarines as you can.

Friendly airplanes will drop Ammo and Health

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move , up down left right

left or right CTRL to shoot machine gun, SPACEBAR to fire missiles

Features:

3 types of enemy ships

2 types of enemy submarines

7 levels

4 music soundtracks
